title: Karlywindow womens Casual
features: Material ♡ 95% COTTON + 5% SPANDEX. Unique high quality denim fabrics provide you with extreme cool and charm.

Design ♡ Button closure, unique pinstriped effect style of denim fabric, shirts design, short sleeve with wide cuff, loose fit and oversize, chest pockets. Fashionable but classic, elegant and trendy.
Occasion ♡ This denim shirt is suitable for daily, casual, street, dating, party, hiking, outdoor, work & office, spring & summer wearing.
Match ♡ This denim shirt can match any types of pants or shoes, such as casual pants and high-heeled shoes. Easy to create a charming and leisure look.
Notice ♡ Gentle machine washable with laundry bag. Hand wash in cold recommend. Do not bleach. Please check the size chart before purchase.
